ygData.msgSnippet: Zero grips his shoulder as he looks to Starstomb still flying towards the base. Zero: I ll be fine... go help the others... that dragon is bad news!

Zero grips his shoulder as he looks to Starstomb still flying towards 
the base.

Zero: "I'll be fine... go help the others... that dragon is bad news!"

Elsewhere...

Gemini Dragon laughs as it looks to Windlord, both heads narrowing 
their eyes.

Gemini Dragon: "Eh heh heh heh... now you.. die!"

With those words the right head fires off two highly explosive 
fireballs as the second head fires off an ice beam, the tail sending 
an intense bolt of electricity at windlord.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Nicolas Marion" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> Starstomp:
> Got it!
> 
> She saw Zero slashed badly as well as another bot she believed was 
Zero's 
> opponent.
> 
> Starstomp:
> Zero, ya read me? I'm Starstomp, and I'll save your winged butt, 
just don't 
> deactivate in my face.
> 
>

> >Windlord::
> >

> >Rod... I have the feeling that this battle isn't over " Windlord 
took
> >off and using his comm link he said to Starstomp"Please help at
> >Hurted Chivtrons, Grounded or other else can help you... I'll be 
back
> >in a nano"
> >
> >
> >--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Soulstice Omega" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> > > Radistor knew this was coming, and actually jumped over Hot Rod 
and
> >landed to the other side of him. Then he spun around and looked 
down
> >at Hot Rod again.
> > >
> > > Radistor: We were just helping out our friends in the Alliance,
> >whom Radistor has aboard himself right now. We were attacking the
> >Chivtrons because they have within their group a certain ex Maximal
> >named Arrow. He betrayed the Maximals, and us Radicons saw it fit 
to
> >destroy him. We had no idea you Chivtrons were allied with the
> >Maximals...
